channel.title: Ops on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Ops on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Bounty: Active topic list Fortress Bot
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: To utilize the Fortress bot to display a list of the most recent discussion topics from the Discord server of Dwarves Foundation.

item.title: Bounty: Earn list on the Fortress Bot
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: To utilize the Fortress bot to display a list of the 15 most recent bounties of Dwarves Foundation that are either open or in progress.

item.title: Bounty: Memo PR list Fortress Bot
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: To utilize the Fortress bot to display a list of the 15 most recent pull requests (PRs) from the Dwarves memo.

item.title: Bounty: Push note from Discord to Github PR automatically
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Last week, we announced about the reward system for fleetings notes, we understand that knowledge can come from everywhere: trainings, articles,… As there were thousand links shared in our channel #tech of our community, we want to take advantage of this activity to enrich our knowledge with the minimum effort.

item.title: Organize team know-how with Zettelkasten Method
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Whenever you dive into a topic, there’s always a mix of what you know and what’s new to you. It is important to leverage what you already know, learn new information related to it, and see the connection between them.

item.title: Claim your Peeps NFT
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What is Peeps NFT Peeps NFT is an NFT collection specialized for Dwarves Foundation members. This NFT will grant the access to internal communication channels and many earning opportunities.

item.title: How We Set Up a Recording Workflow for Dwarves Office Hours
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: There are many interesting topics shared in the Office Hours of Dwarves Foundation, and it would be a pity if anyone missed them.
